task.name: agent.tasks.Bridge
task.description: For the agent, to use a crossing site object to construct a bridge in order to allow friend units to cross a water obstacle. The agent moves to a crossing site and build a "bridge" object on it. The constructed bridge has the same shape than the crossing site.

parameter.name: crossingSite
parameter.description: The crossing site object to use to build the bridge.

parameter.name: bridgeSystem
parameter.description: The bridge system (a mobile bridge or a floating bridge for instance) to use.
